meanings.definition: The quality or state of being done willingly or by choice.
meanings.sent1: Her voluntariness to help others is truly admirable.
meanings.sent2: His decision to volunteer at the shelter shows his voluntariness.
meanings.sent3: The voluntariness of the cat to chase the laser pointer was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: The voluntariness of the flowers to bloom in the spring is a beautiful sight.
meanings.sent5: The child's voluntariness to share her toys with her friends made everyone smile.

meanings.definition: The act of acting or deciding without external influence.
meanings.sent1: The voluntariness of his choice surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: She appreciated the voluntariness of her own decisions.
meanings.sent3: The voluntariness of the robot to follow commands without hesitation was impressive.
meanings.sent4: The voluntariness of the wind to change direction suddenly caught us off guard.
meanings.sent5: The voluntariness of the waves to crash against the shore is a natural phenomenon.
